name: God Monster
description: 《God Monster》 is a unique aesthetic 3d Xianxia game! The perfect combination of real-time competition and turn-based system!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics HD 4000 or Nvidia GT 620 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2048 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics HD 4000 or Nvidia GT 620 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2048 MB available space
